scripts.build: gulp build && npm run generate-api-docs && npm run copy-api-docs
scripts.generate-api-docs: curl -OL https://api.checklyhq.com/swagger.json && widdershins --user_templates src/api-docs/widdershins-user-templates --resolve --search  --language_tabs 'shell:curl' --summary swagger.json -o src/api-docs/shins/source/index.html.md && cd src/api-docs/shins && shins --logo ../logo.png --logo-url 'https://checklyhq.com/'  --customcss
scripts.generate-api-docs:dev: curl -OL http://localhost:3000/swagger.json && widdershins --user_templates api-docs/widdershins-user-templates --resolve --search  --language_tabs 'shell:curl' --summary swagger.json -o api-docs/shins/source/index.html.md && cd api-docs/shins && node shins --logo ../logo.png --logo-url 'https://checklyhq.com/'  --customcss
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:non-cacheable && npm run deploy:cacheable
scripts.deploy:production: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm run generate-api-docs && npm run copy-api-docs && npm run deploy
